content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Crushed Trachea

The target is Suffocating until subject to magical healing. It can't speak while it is suffocating.

 Bludgeoning
Pierced Elbow The target drops one item it is holding (determined randomly by the GM). Piercing
Long Gash Normal damage. The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage. The DC of the flat check to remove this bleed damage is 5 higher than normal. Slashing
Vulnerability The target gains weakness 5 to any damage types dealt by the bomb or spell for 1 minute. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #27
